name: NSScrubberLayoutAttributes
desc: The layout of a scrubber item.

items.name: init(forItemAt: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new layout attributes object for the specified scrubber item index.

items.name: var frame: NSRect
items.desc: The frame of the scrubber item.

items.name: var itemIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the scrubber item that is represented by the item's layout attributes.
